events.name: NUS Biathlon 2021
description: Your long awaited sign ups for NUS Biathlon 2021 are open now with 3 main categories to choose from! Want to push yourself to your limits? Sprint Individual is just for you. New to NUS Biathlon? Fret not, the Novice Individual category does not discriminate. Lastly, for the shy ones, grab a companion along for our Power Duo Race. HURRY! Sign up for our races now !!
